item.title: Open Nazi runs for Congress as a Republican
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Bowser jr:

It is because we design IQ-test and the definitions of intelligence to fit us.

There are IQ tests that are culture fair, so they eliminate prejudice towards white people. Even in those tests, black people have a lower average. Like I said, and so did Elijah, the environment you grow up in is very important. Most black people grow up either in Africa (ya really!) where food is scarce and life isn’t that great, or in poor neighborhoods where life is bad too. There are succesful black people, but most of them grew up in a succesful and educated environment. They are ‘as white a black man can be’.

Being educated or rich doesn’t automatically mean you have a high IQ, but it does give a clue about your background. IQ isn’t the most important personal trait though.

Read full topic

item.title: Open Nazi runs for Congress as a Republican
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:12, topic:456570”][quote author=Elijah link=topic=559508.msg4089091#msg4089091 date=1346147118]
So you think you’re better than most black people? That the majority of them aren’t capable of the same level of thinking as you, just because their skin is darker?
[/quote]
It isn’t their skin colour that makes them stupid, you fool. The skin colour is just an easy marker to find the idiots. They are genetically different to other people, their brains are 6% smaller than white people’s and white people have 2% smaller brains than Asians on average. I’m not saying that there aren’t smart black people. The smart ones should be kept, but stupid ones should be stopped from breeding, same with white people.[/quote]

From my knowledge the physical size of your brain doesn’t affect your intelligence. It’s the environment you’re raised in that affects it. If you grow up in a poverty stricken neighborhood with no one who cares about teaching you you’re more than likely to fail from the beginning. You don’t learn because your brain didn’t develop the synapse between your neurons when you were growing up, not because your brain is smaller.

Which brings me to my point, it has barely anything to do with race, it’s culture that affects you. If you’re white and you grow up in the ghetto with all the other black people there, guess what? You’re a ‘wigger’, you act talk and think like the majority of the people there. Where if a black person grows up in a gated white community, guess what? They’re probably going to go on a lead a pretty successful life. Now apologize and then go shut the fuck up.

Read full topic

item.source: Open Nazi runs for Congress as a Republican

item.title: Open Nazi runs for Congress as a Republican
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Can’t blame a guy for having a viewpoint that isn’t yours. As long as he doesn’t call for violence against certain groups, then I don’t see a reason why he shouldn’t be able to run for congress.

Cut away the anti-semitism (just saying you are pro Palestina is anti-semitism these days, so it’s hard). Nazism then turns into a slightly odd, yet capable form of running a country. It has its drawbacks, but so does every ‘-ism’. I’m not saying I would ever vote for a Nazi, but wanting to shoot them without educating yourself first is a bit far fetched. Sure, the history of nazism is very bloody, and most neo-nazi’s are complete idiots and would qualify for purification themselves, but Communism has a bloody history too. The French revolution was bloody. Capitalism is the result of heavy pollution, and thus is bloody too.

Comparing the NSDAP with your average oil company is wrong, but both are representatives of flawed ways of thinking.

Read full topic
